metadata.title: CVE-2023-40397 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in macOSVentura 13.5. A remote attacker may be able to cause arbitrary javascriptcode execution.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
